column1: Table A-101:  VMT Distribution by Vehicle Age and Vehicle/Fuel Type, a 2014
a The following abbreviations correspond to vehicle types: LDGV (light-duty gasoline vehicles), LDGT (light-duty gasoline trucks),
HDGV (heavy-duty gasoline vehicles), LDDV (light-duty diesel vehicles), LDDT (light-duty diesel trucks), HDDV (heavy-duty diesel vehicles), and MC (motorcycles).
Note: Estimated by weighting data in by data in Table A-100. This year’s Inventory includes updated vehicle population data based on the MOVES 2014a
